name: FACEBOOK MOHD ASIF PAGE (POST REACTION VIDEOS)

parameters.command:
=#!/bin/sh
set -eu

# Merge overlay_file -> overlay2 with a smooth video-only crossfade,
# then use the merged overlay in the existing composition pipeline.
#
# Main background (INPUT_FILE) is left untouched (video & audio).
# Overlay1 (OVERLAY_FILE) is replaced by merged overlay (overlay1 -> overlay2 crossfade).
#
# Edit config below.

# ---------------- CONFIG ----------------
INPUT_URL="{{ $json.public }}"        # main background (can be URL or /files/ path)
OVERLAY_FILE="{{ $('config').item.json.input }}"  # primary overlay (reaction: normal)
OVERLAY_2="/files/fb/Asif/input/laugh.mp4"        # secondary overlay (reaction: laugh); leave empty to skip merge
OVERLAY_2_LENGTH_SECONDS=""    # if set, final N seconds will come from OVERLAY_2; otherwise default rule used
OVERLAY_2_START_SEC="0"        # offset into overlay2
OVERLAY_TRANSITION_DURATION="0.6" # crossfade duration (seconds)

CAPTION_FONT_PATH="{{ $('config').item.json.fontpath }}"  # caption font path
BOTTOM_PERCENT=57
CAPTION_POS_X_PERCENT=50
CAPTION_POS_Y_PERCENT=35

CAPTION_TEXT="{{ $('hook').item.json.captions[0] }}"
CAPTIONS_STR='Wait For End
END MAST HAI
YE KYA HO GAYA
WAAAH'
CAPTION_FONT_SIZE=60
CAPTION_FONT_COLOR="white"
TEXT_BG_ENABLE=true
TEXT_BG_COLOR="black"
TEXT_BG_OPACITY=150
TEXT_BG_PADDING=25

ASSETS_DIR="{{ $('config').item.json.output }}"
mkdir -p "$ASSETS_DIR"
OUT_FILE="${ASSETS_DIR}/output_$(date +%s).mp4"
if [ -n "${JSON_CODE:-}" ]; then OUT_FILE="${ASSETS_DIR}/${JSON_CODE}.mp4"; fi

CAPTION_PNG="${ASSETS_DIR}/caption_image.png"
MERGED_OVERLAY_TMP="/tmp/overlay_merged_$(date +%s)_$$.mp4"
FFMPEG_TIMEOUT="5m"
# --------------- end config --------------

echo "=== Start: overlay merge + compose ===" >&2

# Resolve INPUT_FILE (URL -> /files mapping)
case "$INPUT_URL" in
  http://*|https://*)
    REL_PATH=$(printf "%s" "$INPUT_URL" | sed -E 's@https?://[^/]+/@@')
    INPUT_FILE="/files/${REL_PATH}"
    ;;
  /files/*) INPUT_FILE="$INPUT_URL";;
  files/*) INPUT_FILE="/$INPUT_URL";;
  *) INPUT_FILE="/files/${INPUT_URL}";;
esac

echo "Main background: $INPUT_FILE" >&2
echo "Overlay primary: $OVERLAY_FILE" >&2
[ -n "$OVERLAY_2" ] && echo "Overlay secondary: $OVERLAY_2" >&2
echo "Output will be: $OUT_FILE" >&2

# helpers
probe_duration() { ffprobe -v error -show_entries format=duration -of default=noprint_wrappers=1:nokey=1 "$1" 2>/dev/null || printf ""; }
probe_resolution() { ffprobe -v error -select_streams v:0 -show_entries stream=width,height -of csv=p=0:s=x "$1" 2>/dev/null || printf ""; }
probe_framerate() { ffprobe -v error -select_streams v:0 -show_entries stream=r_frame_rate -of default=nw=1:nk=1 "$1" 2>/dev/null || printf ""; }

# validate files
if [ ! -f "$INPUT_FILE" ]; then echo "ERR: main input missing: $INPUT_FILE" >&2; exit 1; fi
if [ ! -f "$OVERLAY_FILE" ]; then echo "ERR: overlay primary missing: $OVERLAY_FILE" >&2; exit 1; fi
if [ -n "$OVERLAY_2" ] && [ ! -f "$OVERLAY_2" ]; then echo "ERR: overlay secondary missing: $OVERLAY_2" >&2; exit 1; fi

# probe overlay durations
OV1_DUR=$(probe_duration "$OVERLAY_FILE"); OV1_DUR=${OV1_DUR:-0}; OV1_DUR=$(awk -v v="$OV1_DUR" 'BEGIN{printf("%.3f", v+0)}')
echo "Overlay1 duration: $OV1_DUR" >&2
if [ -n "$OVERLAY_2" ]; then
  OV2_DUR=$(probe_duration "$OVERLAY_2"); OV2_DUR=${OV2_DUR:-0}; OV2_DUR=$(awk -v v="$OV2_DUR" 'BEGIN{printf("%.3f", v+0)}')
  echo "Overlay2 duration: $OV2_DUR" >&2
fi

# determine overlay1 resolution and FPS target
IN_RES=$(probe_resolution "$OVERLAY_FILE" || true)
if [ -n "$IN_RES" ]; then
  O_W=$(printf "%s" "$IN_RES" | awk -Fx '{print $1}')
  O_H=$(printf "%s" "$IN_RES" | awk -Fx '{print $2}')
else
  # fallback vertical default
  O_W=720; O_H=1280
fi
FPS_RAW=$(probe_framerate "$OVERLAY_FILE" || true)
if [ -n "$FPS_RAW" ]; then
  FPS=$(awk -v r="$FPS_RAW" 'BEGIN{ if(index(r,"/")) { split(r,a,"/"); printf("%d", a[1]/a[2]+0.5) } else { printf("%d", r+0.5) } }')
else
  FPS=30
fi
echo "Overlay target resolution: ${O_W}x${O_H} fps:${FPS}" >&2

# If no overlay2 provided, skip merge
if [ -z "$OVERLAY_2" ]; then
  echo "No overlay2 provided â€” skipping merge; using overlay primary as-is." >&2
  MERGED_OVERLAY="$OVERLAY_FILE"
else
  # compute FIRST_END_SEC using OVERLAY_2_LENGTH_SECONDS semantics
  if [ -n "$OVERLAY_2_LENGTH_SECONDS" ]; then
    OVERLAY_2_LENGTH_SECONDS=$(awk -v v="$OVERLAY_2_LENGTH_SECONDS" 'BEGIN{printf("%.3f", v+0)}')
    FIRST_END_SEC=$(awk -v d="$OV1_DUR" -v s="$OVERLAY_2_LENGTH_SECONDS" 'BEGIN{printf("%.3f", d - s)}')
    echo "FIRST_END_SEC = OV1_DUR - OVERLAY_2_LENGTH_SECONDS => $FIRST_END_SEC" >&2
  else
    FIRST_END_SEC=$(awk -v d="$OV1_DUR" 'BEGIN{printf("%.3f", d*0.70)}')
    echo "OVERLAY_2_LENGTH_SECONDS not set; defaulting FIRST_END_SEC = 70% of overlay1 => $FIRST_END_SEC" >&2
  fi

  # safety checks
  TRANS=$(awk -v v="$OVERLAY_TRANSITION_DURATION" 'BEGIN{printf("%.3f", v+0)}')
  # FIRST_END_SEC must be > TRANS
  awk -v a="$FIRST_END_SEC" -v b="$TRANS" 'BEGIN{ if(a<=b || a<=0) { print "ERR"; exit 1 } }' || { echo "ERR: computed FIRST_END_SEC invalid (<= transition)"; exit 1; }
  OFFSET=$(awk -v f="$FIRST_END_SEC" -v t="$TRANS" 'BEGIN{printf("%.3f", f - t)}')
  echo "Crossfade params: FIRST_END_SEC=$FIRST_END_SEC OFFSET=$OFFSET TRANS=$TRANS" >&2

  # Build merged overlay (video-only xfade). We'll trim overlay1 to [0:FIRST_END_SEC]
  # and overlay2 starting at OVERLAY_2_START_SEC; scale/fps/format to match overlay1 target.
  echo "Creating merged overlay video at: $MERGED_OVERLAY_TMP" >&2

  ffmpeg -y -hide_banner -loglevel error \
    -i "$OVERLAY_FILE" -i "$OVERLAY_2" \
    -filter_complex "\
[0:v]trim=start=0:end=${FIRST_END_SEC},setpts=PTS-STARTPTS,scale=${O_W}:${O_H},fps=${FPS},setsar=1,format=yuv420p[v0]; \
[1:v]trim=start=${OVERLAY_2_START_SEC},setpts=PTS-STARTPTS,scale=${O_W}:${O_H},fps=${FPS},setsar=1,format=yuv420p[v1]; \
[v0][v1]xfade=transition=fade:duration=${TRANS}:offset=${OFFSET}[vxf]" \
    -map "[vxf]" -c:v libx264 -crf 18 -preset veryfast -an -movflags +faststart \
    "$MERGED_OVERLAY_TMP"

  rc=$?
  if [ $rc -ne 0 ]; then
    echo "ERR: creating merged overlay failed (ffmpeg rc=$rc)" >&2
    rm -f "$MERGED_OVERLAY_TMP" || true
    exit 1
  fi

  MERGED_OVERLAY="$MERGED_OVERLAY_TMP"
  echo "Merged overlay created: $MERGED_OVERLAY" >&2
fi

# --- generate caption image (same as before) ---
rm -f "${CAPTION_PNG}" || true
export CAPTION_PNG CAPTION_TEXT CAPTION_FONT_PATH CAPTION_FONT_SIZE CAPTION_FONT_COLOR CAPTION_POS_X_PERCENT CAPTION_POS_Y_PERCENT TEXT_BG_ENABLE TEXT_BG_COLOR TEXT_BG_OPACITY TEXT_BG_PADDING

python3 - <<'PY' 1>&2
import os
from PIL import Image, ImageDraw, ImageFont
out_path = os.environ["CAPTION_PNG"]
text = os.environ.get("CAPTION_TEXT", "")
font_path = os.environ.get("CAPTION_FONT_PATH", "/usr/share/fonts/truetype/dejavu/DejaVuSans-Bold.ttf")
try:
    font_size = int(os.environ.get("CAPTION_FONT_SIZE", "64"))
except:
    font_size = 64
font_color = os.environ.get("CAPTION_FONT_COLOR", "white")
try:
    pos_x_pct = int(os.environ.get("CAPTION_POS_X_PERCENT", "50"))
except:
    pos_x_pct = 50
try:
    pos_y_pct = int(os.environ.get("CAPTION_POS_Y_PERCENT", "50"))
except:
    pos_y_pct = 50
bg_enable = os.environ.get("TEXT_BG_ENABLE", "true").lower() == 'true'
try:
    bg_opacity = int(os.environ.get("TEXT_BG_OPACITY", "150"))
except:
    bg_opacity = 150
try:
    bg_padding = int(os.environ.get("TEXT_BG_PADDING", "20"))
except:
    bg_padding = 20

canvas_w, canvas_h = 1080, 1920
canvas = Image.new("RGBA", (canvas_w, canvas_h), (0, 0, 0, 0))
draw = ImageDraw.Draw(canvas)
font = None
try:
    font = ImageFont.truetype(font_path, font_size)
    print("Loaded font:", font_path, "size", font_size)
except Exception as e:
    print("Font load failed:", e)
    candidates = [
        "/usr/share/fonts/truetype/dejavu/DejaVuSans-Bold.ttf",
        "/usr/share/fonts/truetype/liberation/LiberationSans-Bold.ttf"
    ]
    for p in candidates:
        if os.path.isfile(p):
            try:
                font = ImageFont.truetype(p, font_size)
                print("Loaded fallback font:", p)
                break
            except Exception:
                font = None
    if font is None:
        font = ImageFont.load_default()
        print("Using PIL default font (size may be ignored)")

text = text or " "
lines = text.splitlines() if "\n" in text else [text]
line_heights = []
max_w = 0
temp_draw = ImageDraw.Draw(canvas)
for ln in lines:
    bbox = temp_draw.textbbox((0,0), ln, font=font)
    w = bbox[2] - bbox[0]
    h = bbox[3] - bbox[1]
    line_heights.append(h)
    if w > max_w:
        max_w = w
total_h = sum(line_heights) + (len(lines)-1) * int(font_size * 0.2)

x = (canvas_w * pos_x_pct / 100.0) - (max_w / 2.0)
y = (canvas_h * pos_y_pct / 100.0) - (total_h / 2.0)

if bg_enable:
    bg_layer = Image.new("RGBA", (canvas_w, canvas_h), (0,0,0,0))
    bg_draw = ImageDraw.Draw(bg_layer)
    left = int(x - bg_padding)
    top = int(y - bg_padding)
    right = int(x + max_w + bg_padding)
    bottom = int(y + total_h + bg_padding)
    bg_draw.rectangle([left, top, right, bottom], fill=(0,0,0,bg_opacity))
    canvas = Image.alpha_composite(canvas, bg_layer)

draw = ImageDraw.Draw(canvas)
cur_y = y
for idx, ln in enumerate(lines):
    draw.text((x, cur_y), ln, font=font, fill=font_color)
    cur_y += line_heights[idx] + int(font_size * 0.2)

os.makedirs(os.path.dirname(out_path), exist_ok=True)
canvas.save(out_path)
print("Saved caption image to", out_path)
PY

if [ ! -f "$CAPTION_PNG" ]; then
  echo "ERR: caption image generation failed." >&2
  [ -n "$MERGED_OVERLAY_TMP" ] && rm -f "$MERGED_OVERLAY_TMP" || true
  exit 1
fi

# probe main duration for canvas duration
MAIN_VID_DURATION=$(ffprobe -v error -show_entries format=duration -of default=noprint_wrappers=1:nokey=1 "$INPUT_FILE" 2>/dev/null || printf "")
MAIN_VID_DURATION=${MAIN_VID_DURATION:-10}
MAIN_VID_DURATION=$(awk -v v="$MAIN_VID_DURATION" 'BEGIN{ if(v==0) v=10; printf("%.3f", v+0)}')
echo "Main duration: $MAIN_VID_DURATION" >&2

# rotation tag for main input (same as your pipeline)
ROTATE_TAG=$(ffprobe -v error -select_streams v:0 -show_entries stream_tags=rotate -of default=nw=1:nk=1 "$INPUT_FILE" 2>/dev/null || printf "0")
ROTATION_FILTER=""
case "$ROTATE_TAG" in
  90) ROTATION_FILTER="transpose=1," ;;
  270) ROTATION_FILTER="transpose=2," ;;
esac

# Build final composition:
# inputs:
# 0 = main background (unchanged)
# 1 = merged overlay (or original overlay if no merge)
# 2 = caption image
FILTER_COMPLEX="color=c=black:s=1080x1920:d=${MAIN_VID_DURATION}[canvas]; \
[1:v]scale=1080:-1[top_video]; \
[0:v]${ROTATION_FILTER}crop=in_w:in_h*${BOTTOM_PERCENT}/100:0:in_h-in_h*${BOTTOM_PERCENT}/100,scale=1080:-1,hflip[bottom_video]; \
[canvas][top_video]overlay=(W-w)/2:0[bg_with_top]; \
[bg_with_top][bottom_video]overlay=(W-w)/2:H-h[layout_complete]; \
[layout_complete][2:v]overlay=0:0[final_v]"

echo "Composing final output..." >&2
if timeout "$FFMPEG_TIMEOUT" ffmpeg -hide_banner -y \
  -loglevel error \
  -i "$INPUT_FILE" \
  -i "$MERGED_OVERLAY" \
  -i "$CAPTION_PNG" \
  -filter_complex "${FILTER_COMPLEX}" \
  -map "[final_v]" \
  -map 0:a? \
  -c:v libx264 -crf 23 -preset veryfast \
  -c:a copy \
  -aspect 9:16 \
  -t "$MAIN_VID_DURATION" \
  "$OUT_FILE" < /dev/null; then

  # cleanup
  rm -f "$CAPTION_PNG" || true
  if [ -n "$MERGED_OVERLAY_TMP" ] && [ -f "$MERGED_OVERLAY_TMP" ]; then rm -f "$MERGED_OVERLAY_TMP" || true; fi

  printf '%s\n' "$(basename "$OUT_FILE")"
  exit 0
else
  echo "âŒ ERR: ffmpeg failed or timed out." >&2
  if [ -n "$MERGED_OVERLAY_TMP" ] && [ -f "$MERGED_OVERLAY_TMP" ]; then rm -f "$MERGED_OVERLAY_TMP" || true; fi
  exit 1
fi

=#!/bin/sh
set -eu

# =========================
# CONFIG (Edit only here)
# =========================
# Either provide a full URL (https://domain/.../file.mp4) OR a local path (/files/.../file.mp4 or files/...)
INPUT_URL="{{ $json.public }}"

# Files needed (these can be absolute paths)
OVERLAY_FILE="{{ $('config').item.json.input }}"   # The video for the top section
CAPTION_FONT_PATH="{{ $('config').item.json.fontpath }}" # Font path (falls back if missing)

# Rendering / placement
BOTTOM_PERCENT=57                      # Percentage of the original video reserved for the bottom
CAPTION_POS_X_PERCENT=50               # Horizontal position (0=left, 50=center, 100=right)
CAPTION_POS_Y_PERCENT=35               # Vertical position (0=top, 50=center, 100=bottom)

# Caption / text
CAPTION_TEXT="Your Caption Here"
CAPTIONS_STR='Wait For End
END MAST HAI
YE KYA HO GAYA
WAAAH'
CAPTION_FONT_SIZE=60
CAPTION_FONT_COLOR="white"

# Text BG box
TEXT_BG_ENABLE=true
TEXT_BG_COLOR="black"
TEXT_BG_OPACITY=150
TEXT_BG_PADDING=25

# Output naming (uses code if present in env var JSON_CODE, else timestamp)
ASSETS_DIR="{{ $('config').item.json.output }}"
mkdir -p "$ASSETS_DIR"
OUT_FILE="${ASSETS_DIR}/output_$(date +%s).mp4"
# If your environment injects a code variable, set JSON_CODE env and it will be used:
if [ -n "${JSON_CODE:-}" ]; then
  OUT_FILE="${ASSETS_DIR}/${JSON_CODE}.mp4"
fi

# Path used for the caption image
CAPTION_PNG="${ASSETS_DIR}/caption_image.png"

# ffmpeg timeout (seconds)
FFMPEG_TIMEOUT="5m"
# =========================
# End config
# =========================

# All informational output goes to stderr so stdout stays clean (only final basename printed)
echo "=== Video processing started ===" >&2

# --- Resolve INPUT_FILE whether INPUT_URL is a URL or a path ---
INPUT_FILE=""
case "$INPUT_URL" in
  http://*|https://*)
    # Strip domain to produce relative path used by your file server mapping
    REL_PATH=$(printf "%s" "$INPUT_URL" | sed -E 's@https?://[^/]+/@@')
    INPUT_FILE="/files/${REL_PATH}"
    echo "Detected full URL; mapped to local path: $INPUT_FILE" >&2
    ;;
  /files/*)
    INPUT_FILE="$INPUT_URL"
    echo "Detected absolute /files path: $INPUT_FILE" >&2
    ;;
  files/*)
    INPUT_FILE="/$INPUT_URL"
    echo "Detected path starting with files/: $INPUT_FILE" >&2
    ;;
  *)
    INPUT_FILE="/files/${INPUT_URL}"
    echo "Detected relative path; prefixed to /files/: $INPUT_FILE" >&2
    ;;
esac

echo "Output will be: $OUT_FILE" >&2
echo "Overlay file: $OVERLAY_FILE" >&2
echo "Caption font path: $CAPTION_FONT_PATH" >&2

# ---------- Random caption selection ----------
if [ -n "${CAPTIONS_STR}" ]; then
  if command -v shuf >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    CAPTION_TEXT=$(printf "%s\n" "$CAPTIONS_STR" | shuf -n 1)
  else
    # portable awk fallback
    CAPTION_TEXT=$(printf "%s\n" "$CAPTIONS_STR" | awk 'BEGIN{srand()} {lines[NR]=$0} END{print lines[int(rand()*NR)+1]}')
  fi
  [ -n "$CAPTION_TEXT" ] || CAPTION_TEXT="Your Caption Here"
  echo "Selected caption: $CAPTION_TEXT" >&2
else
  echo "Using fixed caption: $CAPTION_TEXT" >&2
fi

# ---------------- File existence checks ----------------
if [ ! -f "$INPUT_FILE" ]; then
  echo "ERR: Main input file not found: $INPUT_FILE" >&2
  exit 1
fi
if [ ! -f "$OVERLAY_FILE" ]; then
  echo "ERR: Overlay file not found: $OVERLAY_FILE" >&2
  exit 1
fi

# ---------------- Gather metadata ----------------
ROTATE_TAG=$(ffprobe -v error -select_streams v:0 -show_entries stream_tags=rotate -of default=nw=1:nk=1 "$INPUT_FILE" 2>/dev/null || printf "0")
MAIN_VID_DURATION=$(ffprobe -v error -show_entries format=duration -of default=noprint_wrappers=1:nokey=1 "$INPUT_FILE" 2>/dev/null || printf "")
if [ -z "$MAIN_VID_DURATION" ]; then
  MAIN_VID_DURATION=10
fi
echo "Main duration: $MAIN_VID_DURATION" >&2
echo "Rotate tag: $ROTATE_TAG" >&2

ROTATION_FILTER=""
case "$ROTATE_TAG" in
  90) ROTATION_FILTER="transpose=1," ;;
  270) ROTATION_FILTER="transpose=2," ;;
esac

# Remove old caption image to avoid caching issues
echo "Cache-Busting: Deleting old caption image if it exists..." >&2
rm -f "${CAPTION_PNG}" || true

# Export env for the python caption generator
export CAPTION_PNG CAPTION_TEXT CAPTION_FONT_PATH CAPTION_FONT_SIZE CAPTION_FONT_COLOR CAPTION_POS_X_PERCENT CAPTION_POS_Y_PERCENT TEXT_BG_ENABLE TEXT_BG_COLOR TEXT_BG_OPACITY TEXT_BG_PADDING

echo "Generating new caption image -> ${CAPTION_PNG}" >&2
# Redirect python's stdout/stderr to stderr so it won't pollute stdout
python3 - <<'PY' 1>&2
import os
from PIL import Image, ImageDraw, ImageFont

out_path = os.environ["CAPTION_PNG"]
text = os.environ.get("CAPTION_TEXT", "")
font_path = os.environ.get("CAPTION_FONT_PATH", "/usr/share/fonts/truetype/dejavu/DejaVuSans-Bold.ttf")
try:
    font_size = int(os.environ.get("CAPTION_FONT_SIZE", "64"))
except:
    font_size = 64
font_color = os.environ.get("CAPTION_FONT_COLOR", "white")
try:
    pos_x_pct = int(os.environ.get("CAPTION_POS_X_PERCENT", "50"))
except:
    pos_x_pct = 50
try:
    pos_y_pct = int(os.environ.get("CAPTION_POS_Y_PERCENT", "50"))
except:
    pos_y_pct = 50
bg_enable = os.environ.get("TEXT_BG_ENABLE", "true").lower() == 'true'
try:
    bg_opacity = int(os.environ.get("TEXT_BG_OPACITY", "150"))
except:
    bg_opacity = 150
try:
    bg_padding = int(os.environ.get("TEXT_BG_PADDING", "20"))
except:
    bg_padding = 20

canvas_w, canvas_h = 1080, 1920
canvas = Image.new("RGBA", (canvas_w, canvas_h), (0, 0, 0, 0))
draw = ImageDraw.Draw(canvas)

# Try load font, fallback gracefully
font = None
try:
    font = ImageFont.truetype(font_path, font_size)
    print("Loaded font:", font_path, "size", font_size)
except Exception as e:
    print("Font load failed:", e)
    candidates = [
        "/usr/share/fonts/truetype/dejavu/DejaVuSans-Bold.ttf",
        "/usr/share/fonts/truetype/liberation/LiberationSans-Bold.ttf"
    ]
    for p in candidates:
        if os.path.isfile(p):
            try:
                font = ImageFont.truetype(p, font_size)
                print("Loaded fallback font:", p)
                break
            except Exception:
                font = None
    if font is None:
        font = ImageFont.load_default()
        print("Using PIL default font (size may be ignored)")

text = text or " "
lines = text.splitlines() if "\n" in text else [text]
line_heights = []
max_w = 0
temp_draw = ImageDraw.Draw(canvas)
for ln in lines:
    bbox = temp_draw.textbbox((0,0), ln, font=font)
    w = bbox[2] - bbox[0]
    h = bbox[3] - bbox[1]
    line_heights.append(h)
    if w > max_w:
        max_w = w
total_h = sum(line_heights) + (len(lines)-1) * int(font_size * 0.2)

x = (canvas_w * pos_x_pct / 100.0) - (max_w / 2.0)
y = (canvas_h * pos_y_pct / 100.0) - (total_h / 2.0)

if bg_enable:
    bg_layer = Image.new("RGBA", (canvas_w, canvas_h), (0,0,0,0))
    bg_draw = ImageDraw.Draw(bg_layer)
    left = int(x - bg_padding)
    top = int(y - bg_padding)
    right = int(x + max_w + bg_padding)
    bottom = int(y + total_h + bg_padding)
    bg_draw.rectangle([left, top, right, bottom], fill=(0,0,0,bg_opacity))
    canvas = Image.alpha_composite(canvas, bg_layer)

draw = ImageDraw.Draw(canvas)
cur_y = y
for idx, ln in enumerate(lines):
    draw.text((x, cur_y), ln, font=font, fill=font_color)
    cur_y += line_heights[idx] + int(font_size * 0.2)

os.makedirs(os.path.dirname(out_path), exist_ok=True)
canvas.save(out_path)
print("Saved caption image to", out_path)
PY

if [ ! -f "$CAPTION_PNG" ]; then
  echo "ERR: Python script failed to generate caption image." >&2
  exit 1
fi

# --- Build ffmpeg filter_complex (includes hflip on bottom video) ---
FILTER_COMPLEX="color=c=black:s=1080x1920:d=${MAIN_VID_DURATION}[canvas]; \
[1:v]scale=1080:-1[top_video]; \
[0:v]${ROTATION_FILTER}crop=in_w:in_h*${BOTTOM_PERCENT}/100:0:in_h-in_h*${BOTTOM_PERCENT}/100,scale=1080:-1,hflip[bottom_video]; \
[canvas][top_video]overlay=(W-w)/2:0[bg_with_top]; \
[bg_with_top][bottom_video]overlay=(W-w)/2:H-h[layout_complete]; \
[layout_complete][2:v]overlay=0:0[final_v]"

echo "Composing final video with caption..." >&2
if timeout "$FFMPEG_TIMEOUT" ffmpeg -hide_banner -y \
  -loglevel error \
  -i "$INPUT_FILE" \
  -i "$OVERLAY_FILE" \
  -i "$CAPTION_PNG" \
  -filter_complex "${FILTER_COMPLEX}" \
  -map "[final_v]" \
  -map 0:a? \
  -c:v libx264 -crf 23 -preset veryfast \
  -c:a copy \
  -aspect 9:16 \
  -t "$MAIN_VID_DURATION" \
  "$OUT_FILE" < /dev/null; then
  # Remove caption image (clean up) before printing final filename
  rm -f "$CAPTION_PNG" || true
  # Print only the clean filename to STDOUT (so downstream systems get a single clean value)
  printf '%s\n' "$(basename "$OUT_FILE")"
  exit 0
else
  echo "âŒ ERR: ffmpeg failed or timed out after ${FFMPEG_TIMEOUT}." >&2
  exit 1
fi
